title: Provide a dump-debug tool for debugging issues from the field
author: sparerd
body_snippet:
As a developer, I sometimes need extensive debug info to troubleshoot issues that end users are seeing but that I'm not able to replicate. It would be useful to provide a tool within mRemoteNG to gather all debugging information that we may want and allow the user to copy this directly into their bug reports.

## Expected Behavior
Add a tool to mRemoteNG under one of the menus that allows the user to view and copy the following information:
- All program settings and their current values
- ...
